Package Appointment

Interface AppointmentSchedulingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentManager
public interface AppointmentSchedulingService
The AppointmentSchedulingService interface provides methods for scheduling, rescheduling, canceling, and managing appointments.

This interface defines core functionalities required for handling appointments, including scheduling new appointments, modifying existing ones, and managing appointment status changes.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Xing Juan Rennie

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      void scheduleAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentSlotID)
      Schedules a new appointment for a patient based on the specified slot ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      appointmentSlotID - The ID of the appointment slot to be booked.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      void rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentID, String newAppointmentSlotID)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new slot.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      newAppointmentSlotID - The ID of the new appointment slot.

    • cancelAppointment

      void cancelAppointment(String appointmentID)
      Cancels an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be canceled.

    • acceptDeclineAppointment

      void acceptDeclineAppointment(String appointmentID, String decision)
      Allows a doctor to accept or decline an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      decision - The decision of the doctor ("Accept" or "Decline").
